page.title: 08TRANSPORT- TEESPORT
page.content: Teesport is on an area of reclaimed land to the south of the River Tees(GR 5423). Teesport is owned by the Tees and Hartlepool Port Authority and leased out to private companies. The port authority provides a waterway at an adequate depth( 10 to 15m ) and land for lease. Harbour police, river pilots, fire services, tugs and private tow services are contracted in by Teesport. The port has three large quays, all with long and short term storage facilities. Teesbulk Handling, Bell Line, Ferrymasters, Nissan U.K., Polanglia and B.S.C. are among the companies leasing land from the Port Authority. { {SEE FULL LIST PAGE 9 {TRANSPORT-COMPANIES IN TEESDOCK { }
